page.title: 12Housing in Magor
page.content: Since the begining of the 20th Century the population of Magor has grown rapidly.In the begining there were just a few houses dotted around and a few have survived with a preservation order,to make sure that the older buildings are not demolished. Near the square are all the old houses dating from the 1600's,these deserve to be protected.Quite a few have been turned into shops.There are many new estates around the area,for example the area near Queens Gardens is called Blenheim Gardens and Blenheim Avenue.At the moment Blenheim Avenue is in the process of being created. There are also two,small,neat little estates called Arlington close and Rectory Gardens in Undy.Withy close is built by the council.
